title: Twilight space wear watch face
summary: An amazing and minimalist analog watch face for your Android Wear device.

descriptionHTML:
We are reimagining the ways in which we tell time delivering a singular experience with this analog watch face.
Discover different twilight space territories with a dynamic background that changes depending on time of day.

A watch face design that works for both square and round Android Wear watches.
It accommodates system UI elements and supports ambient mode with limited color and interactive mode with full color. Burn-protected ambient mode techniques are applied.

This is a watch face compatible with the below Android Wear devices:
✔ Moto 360 (1st & 2nd generation)
✔ Huawei Watch
✔ LG G Watch
✔ LG G Watch R
✔ LG Watch Urbane
✔ Tag Heuer Connected
✔ Fossil Q Founder
✔ Sony SmartWatch 3
✔ Samsung Gear Live
✔ Asus ZenWatch 1 & 2

Match your watch to a fun look in seconds with this cool watchface design.
And our very low battery usage is so much appreciated.

End User License Agreement: http://www.disrapptive.com/end-user-license-agreement
Privacy Policy: http://www.disrapptive.com/privacy-policy
